publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7329 Bill Kidd: Indepen-danceâ€”That the Parliament commends the efforts of professional dance company Indepen-dance in helping over 1,500 individuals annually; further commends the company for its work with disabled people in the art of performing dance; considers the mainstreaming of disabled people with other choreographers and dancers to be significant progress; congratulates the company for all its work, and wishes it and its performers every success in the future.
S3M-7329 Indepen-dance (lodged on 2 November 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*
